info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire County through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Adams, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Adams, Adams, Williamstown, Florida, Hairpin Turn, Greylock, Soldiers Memorial Field, Cheshire Harbor, Maple Grove, Eastern Summit, Braytonville, Zylonite, Bowens Corners, Meadowvale, Whitcomb Summit, Noel Field, Rusek Whipple Square, Houghtonville, Renfrew and Savoy Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts.
